areas.description: City center with famous restaurants, historical landmarks and shopping centers.
Shopping district featuring over 100 stores, from fashion to technology.
Park with a lake offering boat rentals, nature trails, and sports facilities.
Scenic beach with golden sands and crystal-clear waters.

properties.note: 2 min walk to city center with a lot of shops and restaurants
40 min bus ride to city center, 5 min walk to shops and restaurants
10 min bus ride to city center, 20 min walk to shops and restaurants

finance_options.title: Pay the entire sum in cash
Repayment Mortgage
finance_options.description: Interest rate of 5% per annum for 30 years + deposit (25% of property price )

finance_options.title: Interest-only Mortgage
finance_options.description: Interest rate of 6.5% per annum for 30 years + deposit (25% of property price )

insurance_options.title: Buildings Insurance
insurance_options.description: Protects the structure of your home (walls, roof) and permanent fixtures (kitchen).

insurance_options.title: Contents Insurance
insurance_options.description: Protects belongings inside your home, such as furniture and electronics.

March.title: Water Leakage
March.description: One of your tenants complained of a leak, which was discovered to come from a broken pipe.
March.NoInsurance: As you did not opt for any insurance, you need to pay
March.bothInsurance: Thankfully, the damages are covered by the buildings and contents insurance you bought.
